jeans.title: RIPPED SKINNY JEANS
jeans.desc: Skinny jeans with five pockets. Washed effect and rips with interior patch at legs. Frayed hem. Front zip and metal button closure.

jeans.title: SLIM FIT JEANS
jeans.desc: Slim fit jeans with washed effect. Five pockets. Front zip and button closure.

jeans.title: RIPPED SKINNY JEANS WITH BANDANA PATCH
jeans.desc: Skinny jeans with five pockets. Washed effect and rips with contrasting interior patch with bandana print. Frayed hem. Front zip and metal button closure.

jeans.title: FRAYED SLIM JEANS
jeans.desc: Slim fit five pocket jeans. Washed effect with frayed trim at legs. Front zip and button closure.

jeans.title: SLIM FIT VINTAGE WASH JEANS
jeans.desc: Slim fit jeans with washed effect at seams. Five pockets. Front metal button closure.

jeans.title: TEXT PRINT SKINNY JEANS
jeans.desc: Tapered fit skinny jeans with washed ripped effect. Printed text detail. Five pockets. Front zip and metal button closure.

jeans.title: LONG SKINNY JEANS WITH CHAIN
jeans.desc: Long skinny jeans with removable accessory at waist. Washed effect with rips at legs. Five pockets. Front metal button closure.

jeans.title: SKINNY JEANS WITH PATCHES
jeans.desc: Skinny jeans with five pockets. Washed effect and rips with contrasting interior patches. Frayed hem. Front zip and metal button closure.

jeans.title: RIPPED BIKER JEANS
jeans.desc: Slim fit jeans. Five pockets. Reinforced seams at legs, washed effect, rips, and interior patch. Front zip and button closure.

jeans.title: RIPPED SOFT DENIM JEANS
jeans.desc: Jeans with adjustable elastic drawstring waistband. Five pockets. Washed effect with frayed trim at legs. Front zip and button closure.
